providers.vidua: Vidua. Vidua is an eIDAS-certified provider, ensuring secure and legally recognized authentication under EU standards.

session.default: Não é possível obter informações da sessão!

messages.successfully-recovered-password: Por favor, digite uma nova senha nos próximos 15 minutos para concluir a redefinição de senha.
messages.request-recover-password:
An email containing a recovery link has been sent to the email address you provided.

If you have not received an email, please check the following:

  • Check the spelling of the email address.
  • Ensure you are using the email address you registered with.
  • Check your spam or junk folder in case the email was filtered.
  • If you registered using LinkedIn, Microsoft, or another social login, password recovery via email will not work. Please use the respective social login option instead.


    • Note: This does not confirm that an $t(common.account) is registered with this email.
messages.verification-flow-expired: O link de verificação expirou. Por favor, solicite um novo, enviando seu email novamente.
messages.recovery-flow-expired: Este link de redefinição de senha expirou. Por favor, solicite um novo enviando seu e-mail novamente.
messages.login-flow-account-exists: This email is already associated with an $t(common.account). If you previously signed up via LinkedIn, GitHub, or Microsoft, please use that login method. Otherwise, reset your password.
messages.invalid-credentials: The email address or password you inserted is invalid. Please check your credentials and try again. Are you trying to sign up instead? You can do so by clicking the link above.
messages.claim-missing: You haven't verified your Vidua identity. Please verify your identity and try again or try another sign up method.
